rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with Vastu-aligned space that serves as the initial reception area.
Open living and dining area with Art Deco detailing, large windows for natural light, and Vastu principles ensuring proper orientation.
Dedicated home office space integrated within the living area, with soundproofing and optimized layout for productivity.
Home theater space designed in Art Deco style with optimal acoustics and lighting, featuring retractable screens for flexibility.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor with easy access from the entrance, ensuring safe and clutter-free storage for vehicles.

openings.description: Large, strategically placed windows to maximize natural light and ventilation across all living spaces.
Well-sized doors ensuring smooth flow between rooms and easy access for maintenance.
